newsitem.title: UK: Railtrack shares fall on profit-taking.
newsitem.headline: Railtrack shares fall on profit-taking.

text.p: Shares in Railtrack Plc fell on Wednesday as investors locked in profits after the stock's strong run, dealers said.
The shares fell 10-1/2p to 475 by 1008 GMT.
"They've had a tremendous run this year and along with a few other stocks, they are taking a breather this week. It's healthy," one market-maker said.
From a two-month low of 352p on February 6, Railtrack shares climbed to 501p by March 7.
